definition: just a while before/not so long ago/everyone can remember when..
if revenge breeds revenge, will there ever be an end to it? (Buddhist saying)
pinyin: yuan1 yuan1 xiang1 bao4 he2 shi2 liao3

sentences.english: Becoming a winning poker player means knowing when to quit.
sentences.chinese: 成爲撲克中的贏家意味着你知道何時收手。

sentences.english: When and where to quicken the play is the key.
sentences.chinese: 在哪裏，何時打快是關鍵。

sentences.english: We ask the young Uighur restaurant worker how it should be stopped.
sentences.chinese: 我們問餐廳年輕的維吾爾員工這樣冤冤相報何時能了。

sentences.english: Some glorious morn--but when? Ah, who shall say?
sentences.chinese: 光榮的黎明，誰能說何時出現？

sentences.english: He can't say why he decided to become a writer.
sentences.chinese: 他也說不清楚自已是何時決定要當作家的。

sentences.english: Embracing warm blood, I sing of youth without regret. Look upon the horizon and know not when my ally would return.
sentences.chinese: 滿腔熱血唱出青春無悔，望穿天涯不知戰友何時回。

sentences.english: Everyone in the energy business believes that carbon-pricing will come, but when?
sentences.chinese: 能源行業的每一個人都認爲將會對碳定價，但何時呢？

sentences.english: Ah, I said, when we these children can easily lives?
sentences.chinese: 哎，我說，何時我們這些命苦的小孩才能輕鬆呢？

sentences.english: He can learn when each cow was milked and how much she produced.
sentences.chinese: 他能夠知道每頭奶牛何時擠奶，擠了多少奶。

sentences.english: Just prepare another round, whenever your fever acts up again.
sentences.chinese: 無論何時你又發燒了，只要再準備一份薑茶。

sentences.english: The leading group is to move back at5 minutes' notice.
sentences.chinese: 先頭小組何時返回，提前五分鐘通知。

sentences.english: A：Do you know when our governmental housing will be assigned?
sentences.chinese: 你知道政府福利房分配方案何時出臺嗎？

sentences.english: Sanmen Gorge Saige computer city when opens?
sentences.chinese: 三門峽賽格電腦城何時開幕？

sentences.english: Whenever you need money, send me words three weeks ahead.
sentences.chinese: 無論何時假如你需要錢，請於三星期前來信關照。

sentences.english: When and how does that change?
sentences.chinese: 何時以及怎樣做出改變呢？

sentences.english: The small expensive son doesn't know when seem in June after necrosis, certainly make a noise.
sentences.chinese: 小貴子不知何時出現在六月身後，悠然出聲。

definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]
whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
definite/certain/fixed/to fix (on sth)/to determine/to be sure/to ensure/to make certain/to ascertain/to clinch/to recognize/to confirm/OK (on computer dialog box)
